ADDRESS.ADDRESS2_HINT: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.
ADDRESS.ADDRESS_HINT: Street address, P.O. box, company name, c/o

APP_STATUS.MAINTENANCE: The app is in maintenance mode

CUSTOM_FIELDS.ADD_FIELD_HINT: Choose a name for the new field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.ADD_OPTION_HINT: Add an option so that the user will be able to choose it to fill out the field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.ADD_SECTION_HINT: Choose a name for the new section
CUSTOM_FIELDS.CHOOSE_A_KEY: Choose a name for the field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DEFAULT_HINT: The value to assume by default
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DESCRIPTION_HINT: Description of how the field should be filled out
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DISPLAY_TEMPLATE_I: Customize the layout of the section in the PDF report. Manage multiple rows and add up to three fields inside of each them, in the order you prefer. If a field isn't in the layout, it won't be displayed in the PDF report. Empty rows will be ignored.
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DUPLICATED_KEY: A field with that name already exists
CUSTOM_FIELDS.FIELD_DELETION_ALERT: The field will be irreversibly deleted
CUSTOM_FIELDS.ICON_HINT: Icon to visually recognize the field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.MAX_HINT: The highest value the field can have
CUSTOM_FIELDS.MIN_HINT: The lowest value the field can have
CUSTOM_FIELDS.NAME: Name
CUSTOM_FIELDS.NAME_HINT: A name to recognize the field and understand its purpose
CUSTOM_FIELDS.SECTION_DESCRIPTION_HINT: Briefly describe the purpose of the section
CUSTOM_FIELDS.SECTION_NAME_HINT: The name to identify the section

ECHO.ACCOUNT_CONFIRMED: Account confirmed: you can now sign-in.
ECHO.EMAIL_CHANGED: Email address successfully updated. You now have to sign-in again.
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ER: Error while linking the external account; try again
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SU: The external account is now linked. Go back to the calendars page to complete the configuration
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of GitHub; try again.
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: GitHub has been connected. You can now complete the configuration.
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of Trello; try again.
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: Copy and paste the following token in the previous page to complete the configuration: {{token}}
ECHO.YOU_CAN_CLOSE_THE_PAGE: You can close this page now.

EMAIL.CHOOSE_OR_ADD_AN_ADDRESS: Choose or add an email address
EMAIL.NO_ADDRESS_FOUND_YOU_CAN_ADD_ONE: No address found; type to add one
EMAIL.SUBJECT: Subject
EMAIL.VARIABLES_AVAILABLE_I: These are all the variables you can use in subject and content. When sending an email they will be substitute by their values.

LABELER.EXPLANATION: If any translation is missing, the one in the default language is used instead.
LABELER.EXPLANATION_OBLIGATORY: Only the translation in the default language is mandatory.
LABELER.FILL_IN_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE: You must fill in the label at least in the default language
LABELER.VARIABLES_AVAILABLE_I: These are all the variables you can use in the content.

OFFLINE.DONT_EXIT_APP_DISCLAIMER: Please, don't exit the app while synchronising
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_LOG: Download a log of the failed request
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_RESOURCES_EXPLANATION: List of the resources available offline
OFFLINE.ERROR_DURING_LAST_SYNC: There was an error during the last synchronisation; please try again.
OFFLINE.FEATURES_REDUCED_CONTENTS_NOT_UP_TO_DATE: Functionality is reduced and contents may be not up to date
OFFLINE.FULL_SYNC_DISCLAIMER: All the offline data will be removed and the operation could take several minutes
OFFLINE.HUGE_SYNC_NEED_MANUAL_CONFIRMATION: There is a lot of data to synchronise. Confirm to proceed.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_I: Upload failed for this resource; please try again.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_II: If the error persist, cancel the request to proceed.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_III: You can request a log of the error for further analysis.
OFFLINE.UPLOAD_QUEUE_REQUESTS_EXPLANATION: Resources created offline that must be uploaded online

PDF_TEMPLATE.ADD_A_SECTION: Add a new section to the template
PDF_TEMPLATE.BLANK_ROW_I: View an empty row, to create space between contents
PDF_TEMPLATE.BREADCRUMB_I: Here above you can see on which area of the template you are working.
PDF_TEMPLATE.BREADCRUMB_II: You can navigate inner areas of the template by touching them.
PDF_TEMPLATE.CHOOSE_WHERE_TO_MOVE_FIELD: Choose where to move the field
PDF_TEMPLATE.HEADER_I: Header row, to separate two areas of the template
PDF_TEMPLATE.INNER_SECTION_I: Child section of the current one; used to manage fields of an inner context
PDF_TEMPLATE.INNER_SECTION_TITLE_EMPTY_NOT_SHOWN: The title is currently empty so it won't be displayed
PDF_TEMPLATE.INNER_SECTION_TITLE_I: The title of the inner section is shown only if the section has some data to display; leave it empty in case you never want to display it.
PDF_TEMPLATE.INSERT_FIELDS_IN_NORMAL_SECTION: You can add fields in the template by tapping an empty column in a row.
PDF_TEMPLATE.NO_EMPTY_SLOT_WHERE_TO_MOVE_FIELD: There's no an empty slot where the field can be moved. Add a new row.
PDF_TEMPLATE.NO_SECTION_DEFINED_YET_HERE: No section defined here; you can add one through the action buttons above.
PDF_TEMPLATE.ONE_OR_MORE_SECTIONS_HAVE_ERRORS: One or more sections have errors; please check before to continue.
PDF_TEMPLATE.PAGE_BREAK_I: Go to a new page after this row
PDF_TEMPLATE.REMOVE_SECTION: Remove the section from the template
PDF_TEMPLATE.REPEATED_INNER_SECTION_I: Child section of the current one; used to manage fields of an inner context. Based on the data available, it could be repeated more times when printed.
PDF_TEMPLATE.WHAT_DO_YOU_WANT_TO_DO_WITH_FIELD: What do you want to do with the field?
PDF_TEMPLATE.WHAT_DO_YOU_WANT_TO_INSERT: What do you want to insert?
PDF_TEMPLATE.YOU_CAN_INSERT_SPECIAL_SECTIONS: Based on your position in the template, you will be able to add different kind of sections.

SELECT.NO_ELEMENTS_FOUND_START_TYPING_TO_ADD_ON: No elements found; start typing to add a new one.

SENTIMENT.RESULT_HINT: We detected a generally {{sentiment}} sentiment from the text

SIGNATURE.SIGNATURE_IS_TOO_COMPLEX: The signature is too complex; please sign again
